explanation: Victor claims he was home watching Monday night football — Lions versus Packers. But Clue 3 reveals there was no Monday night game this week. The Lions-Packers game was on Sunday afternoon. Victor fabricated his Monday night alibi, meaning he has no verified account of his evening. Clues 1 and 2 point toward Oscar as a red herring — the Sharpie on his cart and his presence in the hallway look suspicious, but the janitor legitimately cleans that hallway every night. Victor had no real alibi and opportunity to enter the building and deface the portrait.
funFact: Vandalism of workplace art and decor costs US businesses an estimated $15 million per year, and most incidents are committed by disgruntled current employees.
